-e ---

𒅎 𒉎 𒅑 𒅒

𒉎 NI₂ <> 𒉌 ni

𒉎 NI₂ own nature

𒉎 NI₂ one (self) Proto-Semitic *napš نَفْس nafs :

𒉎 NI₂ en- prefix 𒉎𒃸𒃸 ni₂kar₂kar₂ encircle

𒉎 NI₂ نَفَس nafas breath ≈ 𒅎 ☑

consciousness psyche, mind spirit, soul life, breath essence, nature inclination, appetite, proclivity personal identity

𒅎 IM* 1 mud, clay
𒉎 TUⁿ 2 ton, clay
𒉎 NI₂ 2 ton, clay 二
𒅎𒉎 ⇔ mwater=rain

𒉎 NI₂ ≈ 𒉢 NU ⋍ 𒉡𒊑 نُور nūr in 𒉎𒃲 ni₂gal nigal "awe-inspiring radiance" 𒉎𒃲𒅍 ni₂gal gur₃ ni gal gur to be clad in awesome luminosity 𒉎𒅍 ni₂gur₃ ni gur₃ to be clad in awesome luminosity 𒉎𒍽𒅍 ni₂huš gur₃ ni huš gur to be clad in awesome luminosity

𒉎 TU ⇔ Ton Topf 𒉺 pot

𒅎 IM ≈ 𒉎 NI₂ 𓄣 ment as prefix

𒉎 NI₂ en- prefix

𒉎𒃸𒃸 ni₂kar₂kar₂ encircle

𒉎 ni2 'be afraid', 'fear', which represents 'snivel-stative-like' = 'sniveling' = 'fear'.

silent 𓄣 ment determinant

𒉎 𒆸 {ni₂} gur₄ 𒆸 ғорур ğorur "proud" गर्व garv גֵאֶה ge'e горд gord qürurlu гръдъ grŭdŭ көкірекшіл kökırekşıl 𒉎𒋼 ni₂teĝ₃ ni teĝ to fear, to become afraid 𓄣 tight 𒉎𒋼𒂗 ni₂te-en ni ten to cool off 𓄣 down 𒉎𒌴 ni₂ur₄ ni ur to be scared 𓄣 fear
